page.title: 15Health Food Shop:Chatteris
page.content: About one third of the shops in Chatteris sell different types of food.'Country Store' is the name of a health food shop in Chatteris which opened on 24 August, 1984. The premises are rented. The shop sells cereal, flour, dried fruit, dairy products, tinned foods, drink, herbs and health sweets. The three most popular items sold are cereals, cheese and herbs. The busiest days of the week are Fridays and Saturdays. The owners chose to open a shop in Chatteris because they are local and know a lot of people. None of the family had any training or experience for the business. After food shops the most common are clothing, hairdressers, newsagents and confectioners and fast food shops. There is only one supermarket.
